plot outline: James Vasanth and his three friends, all differently disabled, are struggling musicians playing at weddings. They rent a room at Laxmi's fathers house and James and Laxmi fall in love. After a suggestion by Laxmi, the group finds success with their music. However, the course of true love never runs smooth...
title: Ennavale
plot: James Vasanth and his three friends, all differently disabled, are struggling musicians playing at weddings. They rent a room at Laxmi's fathers house and James and Laxmi fall in love. After a suggestion by Laxmi, the group finds success with their music. However, the course of true love never runs smooth...::Andrea
